words.ex: She approached every task with remarkable zeal.
The volunteers were zealous in their efforts to help.
Her career reached its zenith with the award.
A gentle zephyr cooled the hot afternoon.
He tackled the new project with zest.
The dish had a zesty flavor that surprised everyone.
The path zigzagged up the steep hill.
He had a zillion ideas but little time to execute them.
She ended the debate with a sharp zinger.
The study examined zonal differences in climate.
They visited the museum’s zoological collection.
The car zoomed past them on the highway.
